original_text: But anything that does not have fins and scales you may not eat; for you it is unclean.
korean_text: 지느러미와 비늘이 없는 모든 것은 너희가 먹지 말지니 이는 너희에게 부정함이니라

sentences.original_text: But anything that does not have fins
and scales you may not eat
sentences.korean_translation: 비늘이 있는 것도 너는 먹지 못하며
